name: npm-build-tool
description: NPM Front End Development Build Tool

scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.pro: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.pro:watch: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.build:styles: node-sass --source-map true -q -o dist/css/ source/styles/app.scss && npm run build:styles:postcss
scripts.build:js: mkdirp dist/js && browserify -d source/javascript/app.js -t [babelify --presets [es2015] --sourceMaps inline] | exorcist dist/js/app.js.map  | uglifyjs > dist/js/app.js
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run browserSync' 'npm run watch:html' 'npm run watch:styles' 'npm run watch:images' 'npm run watch:js'

author: Pepe Miyashiro
